website_summaries.verdict: Buyers desiring a highly protective Mahjong case should check out this favored option.
pros: Carrying case is waterproof and dirt resistant for the set's ultimate durability
Customers appreciate the high quality zippers and attractive bag design
cons: Many customers had issues with the product's packaging upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Very good set for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set at a very good price. The bag is nice-looking, but not padded (as some are). Both the racks and tile boxes come with velcro sleeves to hold them together. The tiles are easy to read and clear. The only slightly weird thing is that only one of the tile boxes has a cover, so I guess they are meant for the covered one to sit on top of the other and then placed within the sleeve. Not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Rose

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the wait! Great set to have. Tiles are nice, engraving on tiles is crisp and clear. Racks with pusher are great though I almost didn't buy this set due to a review saying rack is flimsy. I found the racks actually quite strong, made of thick/quality plastic. The carrying bag is also nice and light. I love the set and would highly recommend it. Great quality and value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: FL resident

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and easy to carry in a waterproof ...
customer_reviews.text: Getting back to play mahjong, I have many friends and needed a set. This set works well, easy to use and easy to carry in a waterproof bag and not a box. The tiles and holders are great especially with the attachment that pushes out the tiles
customer_reviews.author: mema

customer_reviews.title: Cheap racks
customer_reviews.text: I like almost everything about this set except the racks and lack of extra jokers. One rack came cracked. It was not in a place that I could glue it and still have the pusher work. If the racks were a tad bit better, it would be a great value. The tiles are nice, kind of oversized. The bag is fine, I purchased a bag to keep my tiles in so it would be a bit lighter and easier.
customer_reviews.author: diana farrell

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, but.............
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, decent value, but zipper pulls on case broke upon opening for the first time. Vendor does not have "extras" available to replace defective ones. Too much to return the whole item, so I improvised zipper pulls on both sides. If you're not handy, don't plan on having a closable carry case.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Great portable product - needs durable racks
customer_reviews.text: Carry case is durable and well made, easy to travel with. Tiles easy to read. Enough space in the bag to add a 31" square game mat Only reason for 4 stars is the rack are made of acrylic and will eventually break. Would pay extra for the game if wooden racks were included.
customer_reviews.author: Anita C. Challis

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I am keeping this product is that I have just started to learn Mah Jong and wanted to get to know the tiles this weekend. I arrived with one of the stands for the tiles broken and a very badly printed manual. I would definitely not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Janet  Hudson Wesson

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking game and material
customer_reviews.text: I have used this item for an extended period of time. The tiles look great, the bag shows no sign of wear! Very happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: C. Sellers

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my order and two of the tile tray pushers are completely broken off and one end of a tile tray is broken off as well. The plastic is really cheap. The bag and tiles seem fine. I was hoping that the lw price would not reflect the quality but it does. In this case, you really do get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Renette Oklewicz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and authentic calligraphy
customer_reviews.text: Love the set. The calligraphy of the Chinese characters in this set is fluid, natural, authentic and beautiful, whereas the calligraphy of some other sets out there looks awkward. (I can read and write Chinese so I can tell the difference). This set does have the additional jokers which are used in the 'American' league's way of playing.
customer_reviews.author: funcooking

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised that the tiles are smaller than normal ...
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that the tiles are smaller than normal. The tile size is in the description but I didn't measure them compared to what I am used to.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Kener

customer_reviews.title: Okay value
customer_reviews.text: The set itself is nice. This set has extra long tile holders. I had to use a sharpie to draw where the tiles on the wall should end. The zipper on the bag broke after being opened and closed about 6-7 times. I was not jerking it or pulling hard. The bag otherwise is nice and sturdy. The wraps for the boxes of tiles and holders are made of a material with some stretch in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I love it and the bag. The die are very tiny but we don't use them so it's ok. Only received one plastic cover for the trays of tiles but it seems to work ok. It's easy to wrap the tile trays and the racks in the neoprene wraps and very easy to put them in the bag. The bag is roomy and seems sturdy. I like the black with turquoise accent stitching.
customer_reviews.author: redtopslp

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: This mahjong set was complete and well packaged with two individual boxes with clear lids to store the tiles. It also included two separate Velcro-secured fabric wrappers to securely store the tile boxes and the colored tile racks used to build the walls (included with the set). The carry bag is black with lovely teal blue accents and the zippers run smoothly to keep the set complete. I would recommend this set and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: timothy jones

customer_reviews.title: Received the set timely, but there were no green ...
customer_reviews.text: Received the set timely, but there were no green dragons. I was sent double the number of red dragons so I "made" green dragons by coloring the face with a green permanent marker. Look tacky, but work.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey B Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set at a perfect price!
customer_reviews.text: As a new player I didn't want to invest in an expensive set. This is so reasonable and comparable to sets that cost twice as much. I did purchase a bag for the tiles separately. Putting them back into the box was time consuming. Would definitely recommend this set!
customer_reviews.author: Tami, Los Angeles CA

customer_reviews.title: Great quality set for the price
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what we were looking for. Quality of the tiles and included stands and pushers is great. The bag is very sturdy and the zipper works great. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The game is easy to transport
customer_reviews.text: the set is terrific- tiles are clear and light, and the designs are bright and clear. The game is easy to transport. The company is great to deal with- there was a problem with the zipper of the bag,I contacted them, and the company immediately sent me a new bag. 5 stars for them!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Freimauer

customer_reviews.title: A very beautiful Mah Jongg  set in a great lightweight carry bag.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a new player of Mah Jongg. She wanted her own set and was so pleased that I found this beautiful set for her. A great soft case with clear colored racks with pushers, and two trays for the tiles. It is very pretty and the blue stitching on the black bag is great. It also comes with stretch able Velcro closures on the 2 sleeves , one for the racks, and another for the trays of tiles.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This set was a perfect gift for my 11year old granddaughter who is learning to play MahJongg. She loved the different colored pushers. A great value for a complete set.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Nice tiles and quality set for travelling to Mah Jongg gatherings.
customer_reviews.text: I like the tiles, pushers, bag and rack stacking wrap. I bought a heavy duty, clear plastic zipper bag (on Amazon) for keeping the tiles together.
customer_reviews.author: TLD

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: Love the game of Mahjong and this bag is a great choice! Not wildly expensive but it certainly is all you could need.
customer_reviews.author: annh

customer_reviews.title: I love the really white tiles
customer_reviews.text: I love the really white tiles, multi colored pushed racks, extra jokers and extra tiles. I do not like the zipper. Hard to zip and I already broke one of the zipper pull tabs. Other than that, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Yanez

customer_reviews.title: nice quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice set. Comes in a carry bag for easy transport. Much heavier than I thought but that's how good the quality is.
customer_reviews.author: ANNETTE FOOTE

customer_reviews.title: My wife uses this set and likes it. The ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this set and likes it. The set arrived quickly but missing a couple of Jokers, my wife contacted the seller and replacement tiles arrived with in the week. It's an inexpensive Mahjong set that's quite serviceable.
customer_reviews.author: NisFamily

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Mah Jong set for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Mah Jong set for the money. Complete with racks, pushers with a excellent case for all. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JANIS L. PRIDATKOW

customer_reviews.title: Medium Quality
customer_reviews.text: Pushers do not move as smoothly as they should when pushing out the wall. Bag has a zipper which closes from each end. One end of the zipper does not move therefore bag has to be zipped from one side only. If I had not been in a hurry to receive the set I would have returned it. Tiles are a nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: ccstu

customer_reviews.title: One of the plastic racks arrived cracked.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mahjong set because it had everything i needed. My only complaint is that the racks are made of very delicate plastic. In fact one of the pushers arrived with a piece cracked off one end of it I'm not returning the set because it's still usable. I would have preferred better racks.
customer_reviews.author: jan b

customer_reviews.title: A great Mahjong set
customer_reviews.text: The was a wonderful Mahjong set. Everything was in great shape. I would recommend this company for sure.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schoch

customer_reviews.title: It's complete and ready to play American Mah Jongg.
customer_reviews.text: I like the portability of the case and the pieces are nice. Not really fond of the pushers, but I think they're good for the overall price. I'm happy I went with this set. I was looking for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Murrell

customer_reviews.title: Very good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I just received my set today. I am beyond pleased. Love the neon colored all-in-one rack/pushers. The length of the rack holds all 20 tiles to build the wall. After opening, I thought I was shorted the 2 extra jokers & 4 blanks. Those pieces are inside the bag in the zipped pouch. There are covers on both trays that store all the tiles. Bag is nice.
customer_reviews.author: joe bustos

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this set! It was recommended to me and I would recommended it to others as well!!!
customer_reviews.author: garfleming

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE !!!!
customer_reviews.text: The set looked great! Tiles and racks were very nice. BUT ! The plastic zipper pull tab broke the fifth time I opened the bag! The zipper itself was very hard to get to and move. Now I am 2 days past return. Bought it in July of 2017. Amazon can do much better! I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality Mah Jongg set.
customer_reviews.text: Thought the tiles would be bigger, but so happy they are not or the case would be heavy to carry. Good quality construction of materials and clear stamping on tiles. Pleased with speedy delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Lofaso

customer_reviews.title: Basic American set.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good basic set. I would have preferred to have a patterned back of the tiles. I did not understand they were blank.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta M. Maguire

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about this set
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this set. The case is sturdy but light and the tiles are very easy to read with white backs. The winds, flowers and jokers are attractive as well.
customer_reviews.author: Grenda P. Moss

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: i'm very pleased with this set. Great product and good value.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Defective zipper
customer_reviews.text: The zipper on the carrying case is defective. Other players have had similar experiences with the faulty zipper
customer_reviews.author: Anne Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Nice basic set. Has everything you need to play including a carrying case and racks.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Delaware

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Great set! Easy to travel with and the tiles are bright and easy to see. The pushers work well and the carrying case is awesome. Definitely recommend for any mahjong player!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Diepenbrock

customer_reviews.title: Let's play!
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised at how well this set gives you everything you need to play American mshjong
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No issues with this set. Buy white tiles easier to see.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Shen

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the quality of the set for the money
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with the quality of the set for the money, although a zipper pull snapped off the first time I tried to close the bag. But there is another zipper pull on the opposite side. Loved the savings with the free shipping and sales tax.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... is not level so it wobbles but otherwise a great set.
customer_reviews.text: One of the trays is not level so it wobbles but otherwise a great set.
customer_reviews.author: MTC Esq.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. A great value too. Don't know what could have been nicer. Carry case great too. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Kate Creed

customer_reviews.title: Black blemish on one tile
customer_reviews.text: The set is okay. It is a complete set but one tile (a 6 dot tile) has a black blemish on the plain white back side. It won't come off. When playing, you can tell what tile it is because of the blemish. There are 2 long plastic cases for the tiles when you put them away or carry the set in the bag, but only 1 of these cases has a lid. I wish there was a lid for each of them.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M Falk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set and great value. Pushers can handle 20 across.
customer_reviews.author: CTA

customer_reviews.title: Mahjong set
customer_reviews.text: Received my Mahjong set quickly but the one zipper end broke off with the second zip, so I put a safety pin to stop the other side zipper from going too far to the end. I'll make it work. Otherwise the set is good and was reasonable. The bag is a heavy duty material but not quilted.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Brickey

customer_reviews.title: All you need! Great all in one set and easy to carry!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great set to get as it came all together with all the racks, tiles and bag needed all at a great price too. Instantly got all I needed. Best price for the complete set including bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: Bag isn't sturdy. Should have bought a more expensive set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PORTABLE MAHJONG SET
customer_reviews.text: LIKE THE BAG, LIKE THE TILES, EASY TO SEE AND HANDLE. LIKE THE WEIGHT. WISH THE BOX CONTAINER FOR THE TILES HAD A STURDIER TOP THEN THE PLASTIC COVER. I LIKE THAT I CAN CARRY IT ALL IN ONE ZIP UP BAG. IN MY CAR.
customer_reviews.author: julie c.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Mahjong set!
customer_reviews.text: This comes with the latest wall-building tool (if you play, you will know what I mean) that, purchased separately, are very expensive. A high quality set, worth every dime I paid for it!
customer_reviews.author: Twisted Texan Author

customer_reviews.title: Very, very poorly constructed.
customer_reviews.text: Racks are very, very cheaply constructed. Trays are exceedingly heavy. Tiles seem less than full size. This is the only Amazon purchase I have ever returned.
customer_reviews.author: M. PARVIN

customer_reviews.title: Nice set and soft carrying case with zipper
customer_reviews.text: Nice set and soft carrying case with zipper. No need to spend more money until you have been playing in tournaments and have Mahjongg winning bragging rights
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality
customer_reviews.text: After playing for a year I invested in my own set. The tiles on this set are very similar to the more expensive sets. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: 703Sue

customer_reviews.title: Really nice Mahjong set
customer_reviews.text: Really nice Mahjong set! I am a new player and the ladies in my group were Very impressed with the quality and price!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Long

customer_reviews.title: American Mahjong Set in  a Nice Black Nylon Bag.
customer_reviews.text: Like the game real well. Bag is large enough that it easy to pack away all the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Sybil

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: The tiles are beautifully printed. Packing it correctly with the soft case took some practice; however, once I did it a few times, the lightweight and mobility of the set is fantastic. My friends and family have commented on how beautiful the set is.
customer_reviews.author: Arie

customer_reviews.title: A well priced Mahjonng set
customer_reviews.text: A great economical Mahjongg set. The only con is the velcro wraps that hold the racks and tile boxes. They don't prevent slippage.
customer_reviews.author: M D Bates

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy using this set
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy using this set. It is easy to travel with and sturdy enough to take to movement to different locations.
customer_reviews.author: Glinda King

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: great quality and nice carrying bag - worth the price
customer_reviews.author: C. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Loved this set
customer_reviews.text: Loved this set. As a newbie Mahjong player, this set is perfect. Nice quality, lots of room in the bag, easy to read tiles.
customer_reviews.author: bg5427

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set of tiles and just what I had hoped ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set of tiles and just what I had hoped for. Price was good and arrived in time and great condition.
customer_reviews.author: grandma berta

customer_reviews.title: Bag is sturdy, tiles seem full sized to me
customer_reviews.text: Bag is sturdy, tiles seem full sized to me. I think it is a lovely set and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Claudine Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Product is what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered for the first time from Amazon and other than my password problems it was painless. What I received is what I ordered. Therefore, I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Alleoop

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to pack up to take with you
customer_reviews.text: We just started playing. This set was perfect for our needs. It is easy to pack it all up to take to other places to play. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jack K Robinson Jr

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived when promised and the game and carrier were all as I expected. Very smart packaging. We've played several times and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Snow

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mahjong set
customer_reviews.text: I love this Mahjong set. Tiles are nice. Dice were advertised as large, but they a very tiny. Also would have liked a second plastic tile box cover; there is only one and sometimes the tiles fall out of the box. Happy with this set for the most part. I can find larger dice and a tile box cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as I expected. Suggestion: Instead of putting ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as I expected. Suggestion: Instead of putting the tiles in the containers just put them in a cloth bag - makes the “clearing up” when finished much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Shrive

customer_reviews.title: 5 star Mah Jongg set.
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. Sturdy, well made and a pop of color. I really like the soft carry bag compared to the hard case. And, the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hilts

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality set! The carrying bag is sturdy and well made. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Kasle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set! Great price! Easy to carry. The pushers are great to have .
customer_reviews.author: e

customer_reviews.title: Both of my friends that I recommended the set came with these clear covers over the ...
customer_reviews.text: The Mahjong Set came without clear covers for over the tiles. Both of my friends that I recommended the set came with these clear covers over the tiles. Please send me two clear covers so that I can protect my tiles Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the carrying case and the set is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! Everything you need is all together with a great carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Deezee

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. I play in a group every Friday. Tiles are easy to see and read. I just use larger dice I already had.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Hallin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, it came when it was supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, it came when it was supposed to. The set included everything as listed and the quality was outstanding
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Peters

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this set and the reviews about it were ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this set and the reviews about it were helpful. I am using my own dice! Looking forward to lots of fun with friends playing this game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: American Mah Jongg set.
customer_reviews.text: The set was exactly what I needed to play American Mah Jongg.
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: My set came as promised...complete, quality pieces, with padded carry bag...love it!
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Dabels

customer_reviews.title: I awaited patiently for my set and was sad when it came damaged
customer_reviews.text: I awaited patiently for my set and was sad when it came damaged...but reordered immediately It's a beautiful complete set for playing all types of Mah Jongg
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Minnotte

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just love it not heavy great for traveling everything I need
customer_reviews.author: Ann Bonocore

customer_reviews.title: Happy with set although it arrived with one too many ...
customer_reviews.text: Happy with set although it arrived with one too many 6 Craks and one too few 5 Craks. Don't know how to reach Amazon about this.
customer_reviews.author: elaine

customer_reviews.title: Like the pushers and lots of extra tiles
customer_reviews.text: Like the pushers and lots of extra tiles, but what happened to the posts to put the little disks on?
customer_reviews.author: Addie Davidson

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice set for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set for the price. The tiles are beautiful. The pushers are a really great addition, as they are not usually included in a set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Except for small dice product is very good Nice tiles, well constructed bag & sturdy racks
customer_reviews.author: scott jameson

customer_reviews.title: Great Set for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: The set is great, however, the plastic zipper pull broke the first time we used it. Other than that, I have no complaints. Would have given it a "5".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Zipper is not terrific- hard to zip. Racks seem a little flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Chiasson

customer_reviews.title: Love my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like the soft bag and the tiles are just what I wanted. Everything fits nicely in the bag and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. Now just to figure out how to play it!
customer_reviews.author: mamaD

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: Missing cover for tile box. dice too smal. no holders for betting
customer_reviews.author: robin nelson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The zipper works with MUCH difficulty - a cheap zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Gaylord

customer_reviews.title: Nice set. Only thing keeping me from a five ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. Only thing keeping me from a five star rating is that one of the trays of tiles did not have a plastic top. Otherwise, great.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Great set! Lighter weight
customer_reviews.text: Great set! Lighter weight. The carrying case was very sturdy but the zipper would not close.....this the 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Henrich

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased. Just wish had tile cleaning instructions
customer_reviews.text: Received set today. Very pleased. Just wish had tile cleaning instructions. Also the zipper on the bag is tough to close. It may be just that it needs to be used. For the dollar very happy
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne L

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again!!
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered on time, packaged well, and the quality of the bag/tiles/trays is great. Only negative is that the dice should be larger.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: Product advertised as 166-tile set but what I received was only 152-tile set. Disappointed to have to return it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Amazon Seller - Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Great - Fabulous - As Advertised - Shipment Fast - Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Cindyrella

customer_reviews.title: All is good.
customer_reviews.text: The set has all the pieces for mahjong. All is good.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Drabik

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: It served the purpose and was a good buy for the money. The only downside, was the dice was way too small.
customer_reviews.author: deanna stone

product_meta.title: We pay your sales tax American Mahjong Set Waterproof Black Nylon wtih Blue Stitches Bag 4 Color Pushers/Racks Western Mahjongg
product_meta.description: Full Size American Mah Jong Set with 4 Mah Jong Racks/Pushers Set includes: 4 each 1- 9 Dots 4 each 1- 9 Bamboo 4 each 1- 9 Charcters 4 each East, West, North, South 4 each Red Dragon, Green Dragon, White Dragon (soap) 8 Flowers, 10 Jokers 2 each Autumn, Winter, Fall, Spring 4 Spares (Blank) Tiles are engraved and then painted. 4 Transparent colored racks wtih attached matching pushers. Instructions Included
feature_bullets: Brand New Complete Mahjong Set in WATERPROOF and DIRT RESISTANT Nylon Bag , 166 Tiles. The bag can fit anyone's choice of fashion. Black nylon with sky blue stitches goes great with nearly any color combination!
Size: 19" (L) x 10"(H) x 3"(D), Strap Drop Size: 13".
Zipper made of excellent quality and sky blue too! It won't ruin the nylon, get stuck on the track or cause any other problems.
Please see Product Description below for more details

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars185 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
